item.description:
Maximum 12 people reserve your spot now!

With years of WordPress development under our belts, we've realized it's time to share the knowledge! Come enjoy beer and a slice of pizza at the Skytemple office while we present a multitude of WordPress related topics!

This week we'll be handing the floor over to our front-end developer Kelly, who has prepared a presentation on intermediate to advanced plugin development. This presentation is all about how to develop a plugin for WordPress; an intermediate understanding of PHP will be required to follow along.

Suggested donation of 4-8 dollars to cover beer, pizza and overhead.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: WordPress@Skytemple: Intermediate to Advanced Plugin Development
